article_title: 'World of Warcraft' Still A $1B Powerhouse Even As Subscription MMOs Decline

article_metadata.author: Paul Tassi

og.description: After years of assassination attempts by various WoW-killers hitting the market, it's more clear than ever that World of Warcraft has not only weathered the storm, but continues to thrive even in the face of a declining model. SuperData Research has a new set of numbers based on the most popular [...]
